oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design and synthesis of a novel anthracene-based fluorescent probe through the application of the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
SHAH, VR
MISHRA, PP
DATTA, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: amino-acid derivatives
proteins
rna
catalysis
binding
bis-armed amino acid
carbon-carbon bond formation
cross-coupling
fluorescent amino acid
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We report on a simple synthetic route to a novel anthracene-based bis-armed amino acid derivative as a useful fluorescent probe. Various photophysical studies of this amino acid derivative are also described. Here, Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction has been used as a key step for carbon-carbon bond formation.
